ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] OT - Necromancers
ygData.msgSnippet: I think if you play any caster other than enchanter and your not a worthless human (jk =P) Stamina might be better.  Its very simple to get 200 int these days.
ygData.messageBody:
I think if you play any caster other than enchanter and your not a worthless
human (jk =P) Stamina might be better. Its very simple to get 200 int these
days.

Mu

-----Original Message-----
From: Kimes, Dean W. [mailto:dean_kimes@...]
Sent: Friday, May 25, 2001 5:00 PM
To: 'eqbards@yahoogroups.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] OT - Necromancers


Oh man, I wondered why my gnome necro always had such trouble. I put all
mine into Dexterity. :-p

Kit

*grins*

As an off-topic note, anyone playing a necro should put all their points
into INT.

Talies
